name: Blurple Food Wars
description:
Return to classic 80s shooters while fighting off the fast food horde in this retro space shooter.

  • Watch fast food explode as you shoot them with your condiments
  • Endless mode will allow you to compete with your friends to obtain the high score on the Steam Leaderboards
  • The Campaign includes 24 waves of enemies, with two bosses
  • 11 languages supported, which can be changed real time, mid game
